basics.name: Aaron Ramos
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii! I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025. I am a motivated, resourceful individual looking to pursue a career at the intersection between AI and cybersecurity.

work.company: University of Hawaii Department of Electrical and Computer Engineeering
work.summary: Grader for multiple electrical and computer engineering courses
highlights: Grade and record submissions for homework, projects, and sometimes exams
Verify, update, and oversee student grades
Effectively communicate and consult professors regarding special issues or breaches of academic dishonesty

volunteer.summary: Artist and programming collaborator for game developement
highlights: Illustrate concept art for enemy mobs and ideate item designs

volunteer.summary: Research assistant to assess AI watermark robustness
highlights: Conduct experiments testing physical distortions against AI watermarks
Evaluate data to determine AI watermark robustness against distortions
Help write, edit, and proofread sections of a research paper discussing findings

volunteer.summary: Multi-purpose intern to facilitate 2022 'Midseason Madness' Overwatch event
highlights: Produce graphics communicating collaboration between UH Esports and Activistion Blizzard
Install computer hardware and setup gaming equipment
Prepare esports arena set and hardware transportation

volunteer.summary: Designer involved in graphic creation and delivery
highlights: Design 35+ informative and engaging graphics across UH Esports social media platforms (Instagram, X, Discord, etc.)
Pitch primitve spreadsheet system to document graphics, commisioners, and designers
Communicate with supervisors, tem leads, and peers to effectively create relevant graphics in a timely manner

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Distinction awared to undergraduate students when they earn a semester GPA of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more
